paper_abstract: The intensional fragment of classical propositional linear logic combines modalities with contraction-free relevance logic - adding modalized versions of the thinning and contraction rules. This paper provides a proof of the decidability of this logic based on a sequent calculus formulation. Some related logics and some other fragments of linear logic are also shown decidable. paper_title: The decidability of the intensional fragment of classical linear logic
